image_id.description: The unique identifier for the image.

format.description: The format type of the image file.

image_url.description: The URL to access the image.

height.description: The height dimension of the image.

width.description: The width dimension of the image.

signature.description: The signature of the image for security purposes.

size.description: The size of the image file.

material_id.description: The ID associated with the material of the image.

is_carousel_usable.description: Flag indicating if the image can be used in a carousel.

file_name.description: The name of the image file.

create_time.description: The timestamp when the creative asset image was created.

modify_time.description: The timestamp when the creative asset image was last modified.

displayable.description: Flag indicating if the image is displayable or not.
